lyrics.translation: 第12课 再见，祝你好运。

lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: Where is Captain Allison going and how?
Our neighbor, Captain Charles Allison, will sail from Portsmouth tomorrow.
lyrics.translation: 我们的邻居，查尔斯·艾利森船长，明天将从朴茨茅斯启航。

lyrics.text: We'll meet him at the harbor early in the morning.
lyrics.translation: 我们将在清晨在港口与他见面。

lyrics.text: He will be in his small boat, Topsoil.
lyrics.translation: 他将在他的小船里，托普索伊。

lyrics.text: Topsoil is a famous little boat.
lyrics.translation: 表层土是一艘著名的小船。

lyrics.text: It has sailed across the Atlantic many times.
lyrics.translation: 它已经多次横跨大西洋。

lyrics.text: Captain Allison will set out at 8 o'clock, so we'll have plenty of time.
lyrics.translation: 艾利森船长将在八点钟出发，所以我们将有充足的时间。

lyrics.text: We'll see his boat and then we'll say goodbye to him.
lyrics.translation: 我们会看到他的船，然后我们会向他道别。

lyrics.text: He will be away for two months.
We are very proud of him.
lyrics.translation: 我们为他感到非常骄傲。

lyrics.text: He will take part in an important race across the Atlantic.
lyrics.translation: 他将参加一场重要的横渡大西洋的比赛。
